successes.title: Rivet Wars
successes.description: A new miniatures RTS inspired boardgame. Walking tanks, crazy artillery and cool characters battle in the trenches!

Pledges.description: Hit the Beach! A special limited edition lithograph featuring great color art from Rivet Wars.
Mark your targets! 2 promo Heroes are yours to deploy as you please.  Not available in the base game.
Eastern Front! A copy of Rivet Wars, delivered straight to your door.
Blizkreig! A copy of Rivet Wars, 2 promo Heroes not available in the base game and 2 Faction patches.  This level will attract the most stretch goal bonuses (hint, hint).  Eary bird special.
Blizkreig! A copy of Rivet Wars, 2 promo Heroes not available in the base game and 2 Faction patches.  This level will attract the most stretch goal bonuses (hint, hint).
Blitzkrieg x 2! Everything in Blitzkrieg, plus 2 copies of any unlocked rewards applicable to that level. Early bird special.
Blitzkrieg x 2! Everything in Blitzkrieg, plus 2 copies of any unlocked rewards applicable to that level.
Art of War! A Blitzkrieg level pledge (and all applicable unlocked rewards) + a watercolor painted by Ted Terranova of Rivet subject!
